description: The set of concepts that describe any signs or symptoms that may be correlated to the observed condition.
name: HSPC Associated Sign and Symptom value set

text.div:
HSPC Associated Sign and Symptom value set

The set of concepts that describe any signs or symptoms that may be correlated to the observed condition.

Copyright Statement: TBD

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    CodeDisplay
    84229001Fatigue (finding)
    247347003Discomfort (finding)
    193462001Insomnia (disorder)
    424272000Inadequate immune status (finding)
    48079002Disturbance in mood (finding)
    21134002Disability (finding)
    230145002Difficulty breathing (finding)
    21762000Decreased vascular flow (finding)
    275520000Claudication (finding)
    23583003Inflammation (morphologic abnormality)
    3723001Arthritis (disorder)
    71393004Soreness (finding)
    255365009Tightness sensation quality (qualifier value)
    271587009Stiffness (finding)
    307077003Feeling hopeless (finding)
    1402001Fear (finding)
    35489007Depressive disorder (disorder)
    55929007Feeling irritable (finding)
    48694002Anxiety (finding)
    73595000Stress (finding)
    131148009Bleeding (finding)
    3006004Disturbance of consciousness (finding)
